title: Say Yes: Wedding SOS
resume: Style expert George Kotsipoulous works to transform couples who have let themselves go. From wardrobe and hair to tattoo removals, the couple will meet each other at the altar with a new look, and most importantly, renewed confidence as they head off into wedded bliss.
